text: Ara samuda [1] jatira nikata tadera bha'i salehake pathiyechilama. Tini balechilena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomara allah‌ra ibadata kara. Tini byatita tomadera jan'ya an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i. Abasya'i tomadera nikata tomadera rabera paksa hate spasta nidarsana eseche [2] eti allah‌ra ustri, tomadera jan'ya nidarsanasbarupa. Sutaram tomara take allah‌ra yamine care khete da'o ebam take kono kasta di'o na, dile yantranadayaka sasti tomaderake peye basabe
